description: Polyotessamino numbers T(n,k) (1<=k<=n): take all the polyominoes with n cells (including those with holes but excluding rotations and reflections); fill them as completely as possible with rectangular 1 X k tiles; T(n,k) is number of ways of doing this.
crossrefs: T(n, 1)=a(n) where a(n) is the n-th term of A000105.
author: _Fabian Rothelius_, Jan 22 2001
